Snippet.Name: StoredProcedureAlter
Snippet.Text:
ALTER PROCEDURE /*schema*/./*procedure*/ /*@param1*/ /*datatype_for_param1*/ = /*default_value_for_param1*/, /*@param2*/ /*datatype_for_param2*/ = /*default_value_for_param2*/ AS SELECT @p1, @p2 GO
-- ============================================= -- Example to execute the stored procedure -- ============================================= EXECUTE /*schema*/./*procedure*/ /*value_for_param1*/, /*value_for_param2*/ GO
